body:
@tgamblin  As spack community grows you may want to think of a Governance model. See https://opensource.guide/leadership-and-governance/

I am guessing Spack is using a BFDL model and you are the BFDL. If so there is a template you can see at http://oss-watch.ac.uk/resources/benevolentdictatorgovernancemodel

Here is an example of a ``GOVERNANCE.md`` file from node https://github.com/nodejs/node/blob/master/GOVERNANCE.md

Or take a look at Jupyter https://github.com/jupyter/governance

I know this may be tricky but worth it in long term when there are many core developers to spack.
title: spack GOVERNANCE model missing
